en.title: Submit additional documents
en.imageIsNotEntireDocument: If the image is not of the entire document and readable by court staff you may be asked to resubmit.
en.usePhone: You can use your phone to do this now if it has a camera.
en.uploadDigitalCopies: You can upload digital copies here, or take a picture with your phone if it has a camera.
en.clarificationDigitalCopies: Upload documents that you need to send to the court to respond to the refusal order.
en.howToTakeInfo1: Place your certificate on a flat service in a well lit room. Use a flash if you need to.
en.howToTakeInfo2: Take a good quality picture of the entire certificate. You should be able to see its edges.
en.howToTakeInfo3: Check that the image is in focus. You must be able to read all the writing on the certificate, including the handwriting. Zoom in if you need to check this.
en.howToTakeInfo4: Send the picture to this device (e.g. by email) and save it.
en.sendByPost: How to send in your documents by post
en.continueWithApplication: Continue with this application. When you’re finished you’ll be given a reference number and the address of the Courts and Tribunals Service Centre.
en.writeTheReference: Write the reference number on the back of each document.
en.postToCourt: Post all your documents to the service centre.
en.clickToChooseFile: Choose a file or take a photo
en.fileToBig: This file is too large and exceeds the 10mb limit. Please reduce the size of the file and try again.
en.dictMaxFilesExceeded: You can upload a maximum of 10 files.

errors.errorUnknown: Sorry, there has been a problem uploading this file. Please try again later.
errors.errorFileSizeTooLarge: This file is too large and exceeds the 10mb limit. Please reduce the size of the file and try again.
errors.errorFileTypeInvalid: The file must be in jpg, bmp, tiff, png or PDF format.
errors.errorMaximumFilesExceeded: You can upload a maximum of 10 files.
errors.errorVirusFoundInFile: This file has failed a virus check. Please try again with a different file.

cy.title: Cyflwyno dogfennau ychwanegol
cy.imageIsNotEntireDocument: Os nad yw’r llun yn dangos y ddogfen gyfan ac yn ddigon clir i staff y llys ei ddarllen, efallai y gofynnir i chi ei ailgyflwyno.
cy.usePhone: Gallwch ddefnyddio’ch ffôn symudol i wneud hyn nawr os oes ganddo gamera.
cy.uploadDigitalCopies: Gallwch uwchlwytho copïau digidol yma, neu tynnwch lun gyda’ch ffôn symudol os oes ganddo gamera.
cy.clarificationDigitalCopies: Dylech uwchlwytho dogfennau rydych angen eu hanfon i’r llys i ymateb i’r Gorchymyn Gwrthod.
cy.howToTakeInfo1: Rhowch eich tystysgrif ar rywbeth gwastad mewn ystafell sydd â digon o olau. Defnyddiwch fflach y camera os bydd angen.
cy.howToTakeInfo2: Tynnwch lun o ansawdd da o’r dystysgrif gyfan. Dylech allu gweld corneli’r ddogfen.
cy.howToTakeInfo3: Gwiriwch fod y llun yn glir. Rhaid ichi allu darllen yr holl ddogfen, gan gynnwys unrhyw lawysgrifen.  Gwnewch y llun yn fwy os byddwch angen gwirio hyn.
cy.howToTakeInfo4: Anfonwch y llun i’r ddyfais hon (e.e. drwy e-bost) a’i gadw.
cy.sendByPost: Sut i anfon eich dogfennau drwy’r post
cy.continueWithApplication: Parhau â’r cais hwn. Pan fyddwch wedi gorffen, fe roddir cyfeirnod i chi a chyfeiriad y Gwasanaeth Llysoedd a Thribiwnlysoedd.
cy.writeTheReference: Ysgrifennwch y cyfeirnod ar gefn pob dogfen.
cy.postToCourt: Postiwch eich holl ddogfennau i’r Gwasanaeth Llysoedd a Thribiwnlysoedd.
cy.uploadedFiles: Ffeiliau sydd wedi cael eu huwchlwytho
cy.noFiles: Nid oes ffeiliau wedi cael eu huwchlwytho
cy.fileToBig: Mae’r ffeil yn rhy fawr ac yn fwy na’r 10mb a ganiateir.  Gwnewch y ffeil yn llai a rhowch gynnig arall arni.
cy.pendingUpload: Ffeil ar fin cael ei huwchlwytho

errors.errorUnknown: Mae’n ddrwg gennym, ond roedd problem wrth uwchlwytho’r ffeil hon. Rhowch gynnig arall arni hwyrach ymlaen.
errors.errorFileSizeTooLarge: Mae’r ffeil yn rhy fawr ac yn fwy na’r 10mb a ganiateir. Gwnewch y ffeil yn llai a rhowch gynnig arall arni.
errors.errorFileTypeInvalid: Rhaid i’r ffeil fod ar ffurf jpg, bmp, tiff, png neu PDF.
errors.errorVirusFoundInFile: Mae’r ffeil hon wedi methu gwiriad firws. Rhowch gynnig arall arni gyda ffeil wahanol.
